summary: This mod adds Disney's the Little Mermaid into the game. With a few dialogue options that play dialogue from the movie, including singing!
descriptionHtml: Long story short, the mod adds Ariel to the Inn in Riverwood.  She has a few lines from the movie, is a follower, essential, levels with the player ect... She doesn't have custom dialogue for normal options, such as "It's time we part ways". If this mod is popular or if I get enough requests, I'll add some more dialogue.  This is my first mod so don't expect too much out of me. Let me know if there are any problems.
author: cheasescott
